    WHY DO ELEMENTS HAVE OPENING AND CLOSING TAGS?

      need a closing tag to indicate where content ends
      This paragraph is bold or strong , italic , underlined , highlight , delete or with a line , inserted
      WHAT IS SUP AND SUB TAGS?
    1. sup - superscript appears slightly above the baseline
    2. sub - subscript appears slightly below it
    3. These tags are used for footnotes , mathematical expressions or scientific notations

      4. ATTRIBUTES

      attributes are the additional information/ description ot behavior of an object. a href for links src for
